definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The carpenter working on the rafter passed his axe down to his mate below.
sentences.chinese: 在椽子上干活的木匠将斧子传给下面的伙伴。

sentences.english: Some firms have already wielded the ax.
sentences.chinese: 一些公司已经抡起了斧子。

sentences.english: God's axes of trial have stripped and bared them.
sentences.chinese: 神的斧子将我们剥夺得一无所有。

sentences.english: But now they break down the carved work thereof at once with axes and hammers.
sentences.chinese: 圣所中一切雕刻的，他们现在用斧子锤子打坏了。

sentences.english: She cut down the sapling with one chop.
sentences.chinese: 她一斧子就把树苗砍倒了。

sentences.english: They used axes to clear a path through the forest.
sentences.chinese: 他们用斧子开辟出一条穿过森林的小道。

sentences.english: He tapered the end of the fence post with an axe.
sentences.chinese: 他用斧子把栅栏的一头削尖。

sentences.english: The crazed man came at me with a meat-axe.
sentences.chinese: 那个疯子拿着一把剁肉的斧子向我扑来。

sentences.english: It may spare quite a few forests from the pulpmaker’s ax.
sentences.chinese: 它可以从造纸厂的斧子下救出一些树木。

sentences.english: The axe was stuck in the tree, but I pulled hard and got it away.
sentences.chinese: 斧子被砍进了树里，我使劲拽才把它拔了下来。

sentences.english: Yunfeng hall, the axe chapter deals with Chu Tianjiu for the turf and strike violently.
sentences.chinese: 云峰会馆内，斧子章与楚天九为争夺地盘而大打出手。

sentences.english: The axe cleaved the piece of wood.
The axe crashed into the middle of the old dog's skull, and inside the hovel the boy let out a scream.
sentences.chinese: 斧子一下砍入老狗的头颅，屋里的男孩开始尖叫。

sentences.english: The axe and the inside of the bag were coveredwith the dark red stains of dried blood.
sentences.chinese: 斧子上和袋子里满是凝固的暗红血斑。

sentences.english: The old man jumped into the water again and brought up the iron axe.
sentences.chinese: 这个老人再次跳入河中然后带上来了一个铁斧子。

sentences.english: He came out with a gold ax.
sentences.chinese: 他捞了一把金斧子出来。

definition: to swing (one's arms, a heavy object)/to wave (a sword, one's fists)/to fling (money)
a saw/to cut with a saw
